body: I like same pose with different expressions as much as the 2 guys next to me, but all games are like that bro. And lol, really, commenting twice? @Sunbaka yeah lets just ignore the fact that he has being doing that game for more than 3 years and still hasn't finishied it, mostly because he didn't wanted to hire anyone to help, not until ppl started complaining about the slow pace updates, and is not like the cg set has a lot a variations, is literally the same pose with differents expressions, but you cucks will swallow everything he does because you like being cucked by him in every way.

These comments are so retar*d wtf did you guys know he literally draw this in 3 day for his fantia supporters because his assistant did not finish the game cg in time (he can just not do it), He also stream on pixiv like every two or three days and his stream is very long just two days ago he stream for 12 hours doing his work and he in his 50s !! He can just retire with the money he had but he chooses to draw,animate and hire like 3 assistants to help him create quality art for every month.
Sadly, the Akane / Natsu / Hisa run was peak Takeda, I doubt we will ever go back to that top tier ntr quality.

Is the creator an idiot fuck or is he just starting to run out of ideas? Let’s not say you need a lot of talent for the NTR genre. Given the basic scheme that is so simple that it already hurts and then will these artists be famous? Maybe if we lived in a perverted world, even a preschooler would write an NTR shit more easily than a Lord of the Rings or Harry Potter because the structure of the NTR is so dull.

@xyst16 ur correct, no matter how much time he takes making that shitty game, simps will be happy with only 1 shitty cg image with a wall of text per month, and you can't even say shit about him cuz they ged mad and just say "Uuuh vanillafag get out ntr best genre hurr durr" Dude, you don't have to be an NTR hater to know that takeda is just milking his fanbase, just like Shindol did.

Takeda is in the last stage of a ntr artist, after so many year drawing the same thing he's already tired and no longer even try, he got simps so his stuff sell and he make money from it and looking his last work it wasn't even finish only the ntr parts were finish and the other we're just sketchs
